mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, C.* FROM ( SELECT review_com_no, U.user_no, user_nick, review_no , review_com_content, review_com_date, review_com_like, review_com_hate FROM ZREVIEW_COMMENT C INNER JOIN zuser U ON U.user_no = C.user_no WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo } ORDER BY review_com_no DESC ) C ) ZREVIEW_COMMENT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZREVIEW_COMMENT (review_com_no, user_no, review_no, review_com_content, review_com_date, review_com_like, review_com_hate ) VALUES ( ZREVIEW_COMMENT_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{reviewNo}, #{reviewComContent}, sysdate, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM count(*) ZREVIEW_COMMENT WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo }
